sentences.en: So, you want me to take this evidence down to Ducky?
sentences.cn: 所以, 你要我把这些证物拿去给达克?

sentences.en: Yes, my rubber ducky keeps me company in the tub.
sentences.cn: 是的, 我的橡皮鸭子在公司洗澡.

sentences.en: You and I, ducky, are going to get into a revue.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌了劈叉.你和我, 亲爱的, 会去演一出小剧目.

words.tran_cn: 可喜的；极好的；极为愉快的

trans.tran_cn: <俚>极好的，可喜的，极为愉快的
